readingOnHtml: <primary>りゅう</primary>, りょう, ろう
sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>imperial</radical> radical and the <kanji>imperial</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Wahoo!
meaningInfo: Make sure you remember this radical means imperial and you'll remember the kanji meaning too!
readingMnemonic: Who is the coolest <kanji>imperial</kanji> you know? <reading>Ryu</reading> (<ja>りゅう</ja>) from Street Fighter. Wait what? You mean he FIGHTS imperials? Oh, okay. Looks like Ryu is the coolest imperial FIGHTER you know!
readingInfo: Picture Ryu kicking the butts of imperial  scum like Bison and Darth Vader.
